Sylvan Caryatid.flavor: Those who enter the copse never leave. They find peace there and take root, becoming part of the ever-growing grove.
Sylvan Caryatid.name: Sylvan Caryatid
Sylvan Caryatid.text:
Defender, hexproof
{T}: Add one mana of any color.

Psychic Intrusion.name: Psychic Intrusion
Psychic Intrusion.text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from that player's graveyard or hand and exile it. You may cast that card for as long as it remains exiled, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast that spell.

Triton Fortune Hunter.flavor: "Thassa has blessed me with power and insight. I am careful not to disappoint her."
Triton Fortune Hunter.name: Triton Fortune Hunter
Triton Fortune Hunter.text: Heroic — Whenever you cast a spell that targets Triton Fortune Hunter, draw a card.

Vitu-Ghazi Guildmage.flavor: "Preachers of freedom forget that conformity can be beautiful."
Vitu-Ghazi Guildmage.name: Vitu-Ghazi Guildmage
Vitu-Ghazi Guildmage.text:
{4}{G}{W}: Create a 3/3 green Centaur creature token.
{2}{G}{W}: Populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)

Sundering Growth.flavor:
"One day every pillar will be a tree and every hall a glade."
—Trostani
Sundering Growth.name: Sundering Growth
Sundering Growth.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment, then populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)

Rootborn Defenses.name: Rootborn Defenses
Rootborn Defenses.text: Populate. Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn. (To populate, create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)

Druid's Deliverance.flavor: "So many oppose us, but we are the reed that bends without breaking."
Druid's Deliverance.name: Druid's Deliverance
Druid's Deliverance.text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to you this turn. Populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)

Collective Blessing.flavor: Senators of Azorius often hired agents to spy on the Selesnya. They were told to record every spore and root they saw, as each could become a deadly foe.
Collective Blessing.name: Collective Blessing

Thoughtflare.flavor: "If this is thinking, I don't know what I was doing before."
Thoughtflare.name: Thoughtflare
Thoughtflare.text: Draw four cards, then discard two cards.

Cyclonic Rift.flavor: The Izzet specialize in unnatural disaster.
Cyclonic Rift.name: Cyclonic Rift
Cyclonic Rift.text:
Return target nonland permanent you don't control to its owner's hand.
Overload {6}{U} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")

Selesnya Guildgate.flavor: The Selesyna welcome all to help them heal the city's wounds. The price, however, is devotion to the guild and a selfless belief in Trostani.
Selesnya Guildgate.name: Selesnya Guildgate
Selesnya Guildgate.text:
Selesnya Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G} or {W}.

Izzet Guildgate.flavor: Beyond lies the culmination of all Izzet projects, a grand experiment led by the dragon Niv-Mizzet himself.
Izzet Guildgate.name: Izzet Guildgate
Izzet Guildgate.text:
Izzet Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U} or {R}.

Rakdos Guildgate.flavor: Maze-runners who pass through the Rakdos gate leave behind their scruples and a significant amount of skin.
Rakdos Guildgate.name: Rakdos Guildgate
Rakdos Guildgate.text:
Rakdos Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B} or {R}.

Lifecrafter's Bestiary.flavor:
"Inspiration is found by looking outward."
—Oviya Pashiri, sage lifecrafter
Lifecrafter's Bestiary.name: Lifecrafter's Bestiary
Lifecrafter's Bestiary.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, scry 1.
Whenever you cast a creature spell, you may pay {G}. If you do, draw a card.

Submerged Boneyard.flavor: Aether currents in the sky mirror water currents below, including the deadly rapids.
Submerged Boneyard.name: Submerged Boneyard
Submerged Boneyard.text:
Submerged Boneyard enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U} or {B}.

Outland Boar.flavor: The vibrant forest of Peema is awash with aether. Its animals are stronger, faster, and more aggressive than their counterparts elsewhere.
Outland Boar.name: Outland Boar
Outland Boar.text: Outland Boar can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.

Sandblast.flavor: In the Shifting Wastes, more are killed by sand than by steel.
Sandblast.name: Sandblast
Sandblast.text: Sandblast deals 5 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

Sultai Emissary.flavor: To the Sultai, Ugin's power was just one more resource to be exploited.
Sultai Emissary.name: Sultai Emissary
Sultai Emissary.text: When Sultai Emissary dies, manifest the top card of your library. (Put that card onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)

Thornwood Falls.name: Thornwood Falls
Thornwood Falls.text:
Thornwood Falls enters the battlefield tapped.
When Thornwood Falls enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {G} or {U}.

Abundance.name: Abundance
Abundance.text: If you would draw a card, you may instead choose land or nonland and reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a card of the chosen kind. Put that card into your hand and put all other cards revealed this way on the bottom of your library in any order.

Gravedigger.flavor: A full coffin is like a full coffer—both are attractive to thieves.
Gravedigger.name: Gravedigger
Gravedigger.text: When Gravedigger enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

To the Slaughter.flavor:
"Where has little Gossamer gone?"
—Thaniel, Gatstaf shepherd
To the Slaughter.name: To the Slaughter
To the Slaughter.text:
Target player sacrifices a creature or planeswalker.
Delirium — If there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, instead that player sacrifices a creature and a planeswalker.

Quilled Wolf.flavor: "I know a ranger that thought to make a cloak of its hide. He ended up losing an eye for his trouble." —Raf Gyel of the Quiver of Kessig
Quilled Wolf.name: Quilled Wolf
Quilled Wolf.text: {5}{G}: Quilled Wolf gets +4/+4 until end of turn.

Silverfur Partisan.flavor: Silverfurs are the last remaining wolfir.
Silverfur Partisan.name: Silverfur Partisan
Silverfur Partisan.text:
Trample
Whenever a Wolf or Werewolf you control becomes the target of an instant or sorcery spell, create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token.

Howlpack Wolf.flavor: Wolves and werewolves join together for the common cause of the hunt.
Howlpack Wolf.name: Howlpack Wolf
Howlpack Wolf.text: Howlpack Wolf can't block unless you control another Wolf or Werewolf.

Imprisoned in the Moon.flavor: Only one vault was great enough to hold Emrakul.
Imprisoned in the Moon.name: Imprisoned in the Moon
Imprisoned in the Moon.text:
Enchant creature, land, or planeswalker
Enchanted permanent is a colorless land with "{T}: Add {C}" and loses all other card types and abilities.

Somberwald Stag.flavor: Despite the reemergence of werewolves and the proliferation of Eldrazi, elk numbers in the Somberwald have remained steady.
Somberwald Stag.name: Somberwald Stag
Somberwald Stag.text: When Somberwald Stag enters the battlefield, you may have it fight target creature you don't control.

Primal Druid.flavor: "The power of the woods is only ever borrowed."
Primal Druid.name: Primal Druid
Primal Druid.text: When Primal Druid dies, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

Assembled Alphas.flavor: There is always a toll to pay for passage.
Assembled Alphas.name: Assembled Alphas
Assembled Alphas.text: Whenever Assembled Alphas blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, Assembled Alphas deals 3 damage to that creature and 3 damage to that creature's controller.

Brazen Wolves.flavor: With fewer patrols about, Kessig's roads have become prime hunting grounds.
Brazen Wolves.name: Brazen Wolves
Brazen Wolves.text: Whenever Brazen Wolves attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

Indulgent Tormentor.flavor: The promise of anguish is payment enough for services rendered.
Indulgent Tormentor.name: Indulgent Tormentor
Indulgent Tormentor.text:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, draw a card unless target opponent sacrifices a creature or pays 3 life.

River Sneak.flavor: No ripples, no splashes, no warning.
River Sneak.name: River Sneak
River Sneak.text:
River Sneak can't be blocked.
Whenever another Merfolk enters the battlefield under your control, River Sneak gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

River Heralds' Boon.flavor: "We are kin to the trees, and their strength is our own."
River Heralds' Boon.name: River Heralds' Boon
River Heralds' Boon.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature and a +1/+1 counter on up to one target Merfolk.

Entrancing Melody.flavor: The stronger the will, the more bewitching the song.
Entrancing Melody.name: Entrancing Melody
Entrancing Melody.text: Gain control of target creature with converted mana cost X.

Chart a Course.flavor: While other pirates prowl for treasure, Captain Parrish plunders secrets.
Chart a Course.name: Chart a Course
Chart a Course.text: Draw two cards. Then discard a card unless you attacked with a creature this turn.

Deeproot Waters.flavor: A visit to the Deeproot Tree and its ancient spring replenishes a merfolk's connection to nature.
Deeproot Waters.name: Deeproot Waters
Deeproot Waters.text: Whenever you cast a Merfolk spell, create a 1/1 blue Merfolk creature token with hexproof. (A creature with hexproof can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

Blinding Fog.flavor: "I see you, shiny soldiers, but you won't see me."
Blinding Fog.name: Blinding Fog
Blinding Fog.text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to creatures this turn. Creatures you control gain hexproof until end of turn. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

Navigator's Ruin.flavor: "You won't be needing this. Or this. Or these . . ."
Navigator's Ruin.name: Navigator's Ruin
Navigator's Ruin.text: Raid — At the beginning of your end step, if you attacked with a creature this turn, target opponent puts the top four cards of their library into their graveyard.

Merfolk Branchwalker.name: Merfolk Branchwalker
Merfolk Branchwalker.text: When Merfolk Branchwalker enters the battlefield, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

Shaper Apprentice.flavor: The River Heralds would wreck a thousand ships to keep intruders from finding the golden city.
Shaper Apprentice.name: Shaper Apprentice
Shaper Apprentice.text: Shaper Apprentice has flying as long as you control another Merfolk.

Headwater Sentries.flavor: "The elders say that if the intruders discovered the secret of the golden city, it would mean an end to our people."
Headwater Sentries.name: Headwater Sentries

Vineshaper Mystic.flavor: She has never touched a loom, yet the tapestries she weaves are vast and beautiful.
Vineshaper Mystic.name: Vineshaper Mystic
Vineshaper Mystic.text: When Vineshaper Mystic enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target Merfolk you control.

Herald of Secret Streams.flavor: "You might as well try to stop the waterfall."
Herald of Secret Streams.name: Herald of Secret Streams
Herald of Secret Streams.text: Creatures you control with +1/+1 counters on them can't be blocked.

Shapers of Nature.flavor: Shapers adapt nature to fit their needs and then return it to the way it was, leaving no trace of their passing.
Shapers of Nature.name: Shapers of Nature
Shapers of Nature.text:
{3}{G}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
{2}{U}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from a creature you control: Draw a card.

Kopala, Warden of Waves.flavor: "I know these waters better than you know yourselves."
Kopala, Warden of Waves.name: Kopala, Warden of Waves
Kopala, Warden of Waves.text:
Spells your opponents cast that target a Merfolk you control cost {2} more to cast.
Abilities your opponents activate that target a Merfolk you control cost {2} more to activate.

Tempest Caller.name: Tempest Caller
Tempest Caller.text: When Tempest Caller enters the battlefield, tap all creatures target opponent controls.

Waker of the Wilds.flavor: "Our foes are many and mighty, but not as many as the trees or as mighty as the sea."
Waker of the Wilds.name: Waker of the Wilds
Waker of the Wilds.text: {X}{G}{G}: Put X +1/+1 counters on target land you control. That land becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.

Woodland Stream.flavor: Countless streams flow into the nine rivers, and the nine rivers flow into the Great River. The River Heralds guard them all.
Woodland Stream.name: Woodland Stream
Woodland Stream.text:
Woodland Stream enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G} or {U}.

Mist-Cloaked Herald.flavor: With matchless stealth, the River Heralds fought a running battle against the three enemy forces.
Mist-Cloaked Herald.name: Mist-Cloaked Herald

Jungleborn Pioneer.flavor: "We fought so long to hide this place. Let us be first to learn its wonders!"
Jungleborn Pioneer.name: Jungleborn Pioneer
Jungleborn Pioneer.text: When Jungleborn Pioneer enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 blue Merfolk creature token with hexproof. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

Forerunner of the Heralds.name: Forerunner of the Heralds
Forerunner of the Heralds.text:
When Forerunner of the Heralds enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Merfolk card, reveal it, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it.
Whenever another Merfolk enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Forerunner of the Heralds.

Merfolk Mistbinder.flavor: "The mist clothes us when we are bare, hides us when we are alone, and unites us when we are together." —Nirit of Pashona's band
Merfolk Mistbinder.name: Merfolk Mistbinder

Swift Warden.flavor: A warning shout would take too long.
Swift Warden.name: Swift Warden
Swift Warden.text:
Flash
When Swift Warden enters the battlefield, target Merfolk you control gains hexproof until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

Riverwise Augur.flavor: "Time flows as the rivers do, toward an unknown sea. The wise know to look downstream."
Riverwise Augur.name: Riverwise Augur
Riverwise Augur.text: When Riverwise Augur enters the battlefield, draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.

Deeproot Elite.flavor: "You think I stand alone? I have the forest at my call, the waters at my back. I outnumber you."
Deeproot Elite.name: Deeproot Elite
Deeproot Elite.text: Whenever another Merfolk enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on target Merfolk you control.

Simic Guildgate.flavor: Simic biomancers don't concern themselves with guarding a gate. Their ever-present creations are enough to ward off trespassers.
Simic Guildgate.name: Simic Guildgate
Simic Guildgate.text:
Simic Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G} or {U}.

Burning-Tree Emissary.flavor: Those who regard the Gruul as savage simpletons underestimate the subtle power of their shamans.
Burning-Tree Emissary.name: Burning-Tree Emissary
Burning-Tree Emissary.text: When Burning-Tree Emissary enters the battlefield, add {R}{G}.

Basilica Bell-Haunt.flavor: You can hear their tolling only when your debt is due.
Basilica Bell-Haunt.name: Basilica Bell-Haunt
Basilica Bell-Haunt.text: When Basilica Bell-Haunt enters the battlefield, each opponent discards a card and you gain 3 life.

Knight of the Last Breath.name: Knight of the Last Breath
Knight of the Last Breath.text:
{3}, Sacrifice another nontoken creature: Create a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying.
Afterlife 3 (When this creature dies, create three 1/1 white and black Spirit creature tokens with flying.)

Grasping Thrull.flavor: "Debt due! Debt due!" The thrull's screeching makes children flinch and debtors quail. "Debt due!"
Grasping Thrull.name: Grasping Thrull
Grasping Thrull.text:
Flying
When Grasping Thrull enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to each opponent and you gain 2 life.

Vizkopa Vampire.flavor: Orzhov vampires look for allies in unlikely places in case their new guildmaster turns on them. The fate of the Obzedat is proof of Kaya's power and her hatred of the living dead.
Vizkopa Vampire.name: Vizkopa Vampire

Syndicate Guildmage.name: Syndicate Guildmage
Syndicate Guildmage.text:
{1}{W}, {T}: Tap target creature with power 4 or greater.
{4}{B}, {T}: Syndicate Guildmage deals 2 damage to target opponent or planeswalker.

Ministrant of Obligation.flavor: When the price of your sins comes due, the Church of Deals is there to collect.
Ministrant of Obligation.name: Ministrant of Obligation
Ministrant of Obligation.text: Afterlife 2 (When this creature dies, create two 1/1 white and black Spirit creature tokens with flying.)

Syndicate Messenger.flavor:
"Many wings haunt the skies these days. Few of them bear good tidings."
—Lavinia
Syndicate Messenger.name: Syndicate Messenger
Syndicate Messenger.text:
Flying
Afterlife 1 (When this creature dies, create a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying.)

Orzhov Racketeers.name: Orzhov Racketeers
Orzhov Racketeers.text:
Whenever Orzhov Racketeers deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card.
Afterlife 2 (When this creature dies, create two 1/1 white and black Spirit creature tokens with flying.)

Imperious Oligarch.flavor: The rights of ghosts are strictly protected under Orzhov bylaws, and those who enforce them can count on the ghosts' assistance.
Imperious Oligarch.name: Imperious Oligarch
Imperious Oligarch.text:
Vigilance
Afterlife 1 (When this creature dies, create a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying.)

Priest of Forgotten Gods.flavor: The Orzhov are not the only religious tradition on Ravnica, nor the oldest.
Priest of Forgotten Gods.name: Priest of Forgotten Gods
Priest of Forgotten Gods.text: {T}, Sacrifice two other creatures: Any number of target players each lose 2 life and sacrifice a creature. You add {B}{B} and draw a card.

Orzhov Enforcer.flavor: "You'll pay what you owe, with your money or your life."
Orzhov Enforcer.name: Orzhov Enforcer
Orzhov Enforcer.text:
Deathtouch
Afterlife 1 (When this creature dies, create a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying.)

Kaya, Orzhov Usurper.name: Kaya, Orzhov Usurper
Kaya, Orzhov Usurper.text:
+1: Exile up to two target cards from a single graveyard. You gain 2 life if at least one creature card was exiled this way.
−1: Exile target nonland permanent with converted mana cost 1 or less.
−5: Kaya, Orzhov Usurper deals damage to target player equal to the number of cards that player owns in exile and you gain that much life.

Ethereal Absolution.flavor:
"Time to let the dead be dead."
—Kaya, to Teysa
Ethereal Absolution.name: Ethereal Absolution
Ethereal Absolution.text:
Creatures you control get +1/+1.
Creatures your opponents control get -1/-1.
{2}{W}{B}: Exile target card from an opponent's graveyard. If it was a creature card, you create a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying.

Kaya's Wrath.flavor: Teysa convened the meeting of the Obzedat. Kaya ended it.
Kaya's Wrath.name: Kaya's Wrath
Kaya's Wrath.text: Destroy all creatures. You gain life equal to the number of creatures you controlled that were destroyed this way.

Smothering Tithe.name: Smothering Tithe
Smothering Tithe.text: Whenever an opponent draws a card, that player may pay {2}. If the player doesn't, you create a colorless Treasure artifact token with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color."

Final Payment.flavor: There's nothing quite like the feeling of paying off a large debt.
Final Payment.name: Final Payment
Final Payment.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, pay 5 life or sacrifice a creature or enchantment.
Destroy target creature.

Consecrate.name: Consecrate
Consecrate.text:
Exile target card from a graveyard.
Draw a card.

Revenge.name: Revenge
Revenge.text: Double your life total. Target opponent loses half their life, rounded up.

Godless Shrine.flavor: Sin is debt, and absolution is paid in tithes of gold and blood.
Godless Shrine.name: Godless Shrine
Godless Shrine.text:
({T}: Add {W} or {B}.)
As Godless Shrine enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

Orzhov Guildgate.flavor:
"So much wealth. So much splendor. So much temptation to believe the gilded lie."
—Kaya
Orzhov Guildgate.name: Orzhov Guildgate
Orzhov Guildgate.text:
Orzhov Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W} or {B}.

Arrester's Zeal.flavor: Law is the light of civilization.
Arrester's Zeal.name: Arrester's Zeal
Arrester's Zeal.text:
Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
Addendum — If you cast this spell during your main phase, that creature gains flying until end of turn.

Summary Judgment.flavor: Any challenge to Azorius authority is met with swift and potent retribution.
Summary Judgment.name: Summary Judgment
Summary Judgment.text:
Summary Judgment deals 3 damage to target tapped creature.
Addendum — If you cast this spell during your main phase, it deals 5 damage to that creature instead.

Rally to Battle.flavor: The guildmasters loom large in the political sphere, but in the end, the rulers of Ravnica are its people.
Rally to Battle.name: Rally to Battle
Rally to Battle.text: Creatures you control get +1/+3 until end of turn. Untap them.

Growth Spiral.flavor: Cyclical and spiral patterns are the specialty of the Gyre Clade, which seeks to revitalize the cycles of nature.
Growth Spiral.name: Growth Spiral
Growth Spiral.text: Draw a card. You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.

Applied Biomancy.name: Applied Biomancy
Applied Biomancy.text:
Choose one or both —
• Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
• Return target creature to its owner's hand.

Simic Ascendancy.name: Simic Ascendancy
Simic Ascendancy.text:
{1}{G}{U}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
Whenever one or more +1/+1 counters are put on a creature you control, put that many growth counters on Simic Ascendancy.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if Simic Ascendancy has twenty or more growth counters on it, you win the game.

Incubation Druid.name: Incubation Druid
Incubation Druid.text:
{T}: Add one mana of any type that a land you control could produce. If Incubation Druid has a +1/+1 counter on it, add three mana of that type instead.
{3}{G}{G}: Adapt 3. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put three +1/+1 counters on it.)

Precognitive Perception.flavor: "To control the present we must master the future."
Precognitive Perception.name: Precognitive Perception
Precognitive Perception.text:
Draw three cards.
Addendum — If you cast this spell during your main phase, instead scry 3, then draw three cards.

Quench.flavor: "When properly invoked, the plasma globule encloses the offensive spell with a satisfying slurp.
Quench.name: Quench
Quench.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}.

Biogenic Upgrade.flavor:
"To survive exceptional times we must adapt by exceptional means."
—Vannifar
Biogenic Upgrade.name: Biogenic Upgrade
Biogenic Upgrade.text: Distribute three +1/+1 counters among one, two, or three target creatures, then double the number of +1/+1 counters on each of those creatures.

Skatewing Spy.flavor:
"A better Ravnica begins with a better Simic."
—Vannifar
Skatewing Spy.name: Skatewing Spy
Skatewing Spy.text:
{5}{U}: Adapt 2. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put two +1/+1 counters on it.)
Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has flying.

Skitter Eel.flavor:
"Life has no mistakes, only experiments."
—Yolov, Simic bioengineer
Skitter Eel.name: Skitter Eel
Skitter Eel.text: {2}{U}: Adapt 2. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put two +1/+1 counters on it.)

Galloping Lizrog.flavor:
"I might have overfed him."
—Gulistan, Simic biomancer
Galloping Lizrog.name: Galloping Lizrog
Galloping Lizrog.text:
Trample
When Galloping Lizrog enters the battlefield, you may remove any number of +1/+1 counters from among creatures you control. If you do, put twice that many +1/+1 counters on Galloping Lizrog.

Trollbred Guardian.name: Trollbred Guardian
Trollbred Guardian.text:
{2}{G}: Adapt 2. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put two +1/+1 counters on it.)
Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has trample.

Sauroform Hybrid.flavor:
"Within each of us, the potential for great power waits to be released."
—Zija, Simic mutationist
Sauroform Hybrid.name: Sauroform Hybrid
Sauroform Hybrid.text: {4}{G}{G}: Adapt 4. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put four +1/+1 counters on it.)

Combine Guildmage.name: Combine Guildmage
Combine Guildmage.text:
{1}{G}, {T}: This turn, each creature you control enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.
{1}{U}, {T}: Move a +1/+1 counter from target creature you control onto another target creature you control.

Zegana, Utopian Speaker.name: Zegana, Utopian Speaker
Zegana, Utopian Speaker.text:
When Zegana, Utopian Speaker enters the battlefield, if you control another creature with a +1/+1 counter on it, draw a card.
{4}{G}{U}: Adapt 4. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put four +1/+1 counters on it.)
Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has trample.

Sharktocrab.name: Sharktocrab
Sharktocrab.text:
{2}{G}{U}: Adapt 1. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
Whenever one or more +1/+1 counters are put on Sharktocrab, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

Steeple Creeper.flavor:
"If the Fin Clade cannot produce a reliable venomous krasis, mobile in both air and water, then the Guardian Project will absorb its resources."
—Vannifar
Steeple Creeper.name: Steeple Creeper
Steeple Creeper.text: {3}{U}: Steeple Creeper gains flying until end of turn.

Aeromunculus.flavor:
"The absence of binocular vision imposes certain challenges for a flying creature, which are overcome via echolocation."
—Simic research notes
Aeromunculus.name: Aeromunculus
Aeromunculus.text:
Flying
{2}{G}{U}: Adapt 1. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put a +1/+1 counter on it.)

Biomancer's Familiar.name: Biomancer's Familiar
Biomancer's Familiar.text:
Activated abilities of creatures you control cost {2} less to activate. This effect can't reduce the amount of mana an ability costs to activate to less than one mana.
{T}: The next time target creature adapts this turn, it adapts as though it had no +1/+1 counters on it.

Gyre Engineer.flavor: "As I contemplate what is, I dive ever deeper into the depths of possibility. Then I set an experiment in motion and watch the truth rise to the surface."
Gyre Engineer.name: Gyre Engineer

Incubation.name: Incubation
Incubation.text: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

Plaza of Harmony.name: Plaza of Harmony
Plaza of Harmony.text:
When Plaza of Harmony enters the battlefield, if you control two or more Gates, you gain 3 life.
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add one mana of any type that a Gate you control could produce.

Simic Guildgate.flavor:
"When the Prime Speaker goes too far, I will be here in the safety of the deeps to correct her."
—Zegana
Simic Guildgate.name: Simic Guildgate
Simic Guildgate.text:
Simic Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G} or {U}.

Angelic Exaltation.flavor:
"If we cannot have peace, we will have justice."
—Aurelia
Angelic Exaltation.name: Angelic Exaltation
Angelic Exaltation.text: Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, it gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of creatures you control.

Divine Visitation.flavor: The angels appreciated the offer but politely declined to eat any birdseed.
Divine Visitation.name: Divine Visitation
Divine Visitation.text: If one or more creature tokens would be created under your control, that many 4/4 white Angel creature tokens with flying and vigilance are created instead.

Chance for Glory.flavor: "It is not your time. The Legion still needs your blade."
Chance for Glory.name: Chance for Glory
Chance for Glory.text: Creatures you control gain indestructible. Take an extra turn after this one. At the beginning of that turn's end step, you lose the game.

Deafening Clarion.flavor:
"Commander, what's the signal to attack?"
"You'll know."
Deafening Clarion.name: Deafening Clarion
Deafening Clarion.text:
Choose one or both —
• Deafening Clarion deals 3 damage to each creature.
• Creatures you control gain lifelink until end of turn.

Barging Sergeant.flavor: "Don't stop till your horns come out their back."
Barging Sergeant.name: Barging Sergeant
Barging Sergeant.text:
Haste
Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)

Swathcutter Giant.flavor:
"Now do you understand what we meant when we said *disperse*?"
—Eksari, Boros patrol leader
Swathcutter Giant.name: Swathcutter Giant
Swathcutter Giant.text:
Vigilance
Whenever Swathcutter Giant attacks, it deals 1 damage to each creature defending player controls.

Legion Guildmage.name: Legion Guildmage
Legion Guildmage.text:
{5}{R}, {T}: Legion Guildmage deals 3 damage to each opponent.
{2}{W}, {T}: Tap another target creature.

Boros Guildgate.flavor:
"The more trust breaks down, the more we must throw open the front gates."
—Aurelia
Boros Guildgate.name: Boros Guildgate
Boros Guildgate.text:
Boros Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {W}.

Goblin Banneret.flavor: The Boros banner stands tall even if its bearer doesn't.
Goblin Banneret.name: Goblin Banneret
Goblin Banneret.text:
Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)
{1}{R}: Goblin Banneret gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

Justice Strike.flavor:
"Those who show no mercy to the weak deserve no mercy from the strong."
—Firemane Kavrova
Justice Strike.name: Justice Strike
Justice Strike.text: Target creature deals damage to itself equal to its power.

Swiftblade Vindicator.flavor: A swiftblade is an artist, each fiery trail of their blades a fleeting masterpiece traced on the air.
Swiftblade Vindicator.name: Swiftblade Vindicator

Boros Challenger.flavor: "Send your champion. I could use a light workout."
Boros Challenger.name: Boros Challenger
Boros Challenger.text:
Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)
{2}{R}{W}: Boros Challenger gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

Sunhome Stalwart.flavor: "Before I let you wield one of these, let's see you dodge one!"
Sunhome Stalwart.name: Sunhome Stalwart
Sunhome Stalwart.text:
First strike
Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)

Aurelia, Exemplar of Justice.name: Aurelia, Exemplar of Justice
Aurelia, Exemplar of Justice.text:
Flying
Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)
At the beginning of combat on your turn, choose up to one target creature you control. Until end of turn, that creature gets +2/+0, gains trample if it's red, and gains vigilance if it's white.

Truefire Captain.name: Truefire Captain
Truefire Captain.text:
Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)
Whenever Truefire Captain is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to target player.

Parhelion Patrol.flavor: "Too many have disappeared in these dark days. I am the light that will lead them home."
Parhelion Patrol.name: Parhelion Patrol
Parhelion Patrol.text:
Flying, vigilance
Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)

Skyknight Legionnaire.flavor: Squadrons of skyknights are available for deployment around the clock, capable of reaching any district in the city within minutes.
Skyknight Legionnaire.name: Skyknight Legionnaire

Wojek Bodyguard.flavor: "By all means, take another step toward the captain."
Wojek Bodyguard.name: Wojek Bodyguard
Wojek Bodyguard.text:
Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)
Wojek Bodyguard can't attack or block alone.

Hammer Dropper.flavor: Giants know a solid hit is one part strength, four parts leverage.
Hammer Dropper.name: Hammer Dropper
Hammer Dropper.text: Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)

Tajic, Legion's Edge.name: Tajic, Legion's Edge
Tajic, Legion's Edge.text:
Haste
Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)
Prevent all noncombat damage that would be dealt to other creatures you control.
{R}{W}: Tajic, Legion's Edge gains first strike until end of turn.

Blade Instructor.flavor: "Watch carefully. The gap between death and victory is thinner than your blade."
Blade Instructor.name: Blade Instructor
Blade Instructor.text: Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)

Resurgence.name: Resurgence
Resurgence.text: Creatures you control gain first strike and vigilance until end of turn. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase.

Intervention.name: Intervention
Intervention.text: Intervention deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.

Light of the Legion.name: Light of the Legion
Light of the Legion.text:
Flying
Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)
When Light of the Legion dies, put a +1/+1 counter on each white creature you control.

Bounty of Might.flavor:
"I am the very soul of battle, but even I would never advise open war with the Conclave."
—Aurelia
Bounty of Might.name: Bounty of Might
Bounty of Might.text:
Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

Quasiduplicate.name: Quasiduplicate
Quasiduplicate.text:
Create a token that's a copy of target creature you control.
Jump-start (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a card in addition to paying its other costs. Then exile this card.)

Moodmark Painter.name: Moodmark Painter
Moodmark Painter.text: Undergrowth — When Moodmark Painter enters the battlefield, target creature gains menace and gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard. (It can't blocked except by two or more creatures.)

Golgari Raiders.flavor: What the Golgari can't claim through patient undercity expansion, they seize in brazen topside sorties.
Golgari Raiders.name: Golgari Raiders
Golgari Raiders.text:
Haste
Undergrowth — Golgari Raiders enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each creature card in your graveyard.

Underrealm Lich.name: Underrealm Lich
Underrealm Lich.text:
If you would draw a card, instead look at the top three cards of your library, then put one into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
Pay 4 life: Underrealm Lich gains indestructible until end of turn. Tap it.

Izoni, Thousand-Eyed.name: Izoni, Thousand-Eyed
Izoni, Thousand-Eyed.text:
Undergrowth — When Izoni, Thousand-Eyed enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 black and green Insect creature token for each creature card in your graveyard.
{B}{G}, Sacrifice another creature: You gain 1 life and draw a card.

Molderhulk.name: Molderhulk
Molderhulk.text:
Undergrowth — This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature card in your graveyard.
When Molderhulk enters the battlefield, return target land card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

Pitiless Gorgon.flavor: "The reign of the Swarm begins. Let us rise now and dress ourselves in vengeance."
Pitiless Gorgon.name: Pitiless Gorgon

Golgari Findbroker.flavor: "We gather the past from surface dwellers and sell it right back to them."
Golgari Findbroker.name: Golgari Findbroker
Golgari Findbroker.text: When Golgari Findbroker enters the battlefield, return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand.

Rhizome Lurcher.flavor:
"The dead gain new purpose here. What is strange in the eyes of other guilds is harmonious in ours."
—Devesh, Golgari shaman
Rhizome Lurcher.name: Rhizome Lurcher
Rhizome Lurcher.text: Undergrowth — Rhizome Lurcher enters the battlefield with a number of +1/+1 counters on it equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard.

Mausoleum Secrets.name: Mausoleum Secrets
Mausoleum Secrets.text: Undergrowth — Search your library for a black card with converted mana cost less than or equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

Undercity Uprising.name: Undercity Uprising
Undercity Uprising.text: Creatures you control gain deathtouch until end of turn. Then target creature you control fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

Ochran Assassin.flavor: "The dagger is just a distraction. I carry the real killer in a vial at my side."
Ochran Assassin.name: Ochran Assassin
Ochran Assassin.text:
Deathtouch
All creatures able to block Ochran Assassin do so.

Erstwhile Trooper.flavor:
"The Erstwhile—rotten of body and outmoded in dress, but unfailing in loyalty."
—Vraska
Erstwhile Trooper.name: Erstwhile Trooper
Erstwhile Trooper.text: Discard a creature card: Erstwhile Trooper gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

Charnel Troll.name: Charnel Troll
Charnel Troll.text:
Trample
At the beginning of your upkeep, exile a creature card from your graveyard. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on Charnel Troll. Otherwise, sacrifice it.
{B}{G}, Discard a creature card: Put a +1/+1 counter on Charnel Troll.

Swarm Guildmage.name: Swarm Guildmage
Swarm Guildmage.text:
{4}{B}, {T}: Creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain menace until end of turn. (They can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
{1}{G}, {T}: You gain 2 life.

Glowspore Shaman.flavor: From death she grows living grandeur.
Glowspore Shaman.name: Glowspore Shaman
Glowspore Shaman.text: When Glowspore Shaman enters the battlefield, put the top three cards of your library into your graveyard. You may put a land card from your graveyard on top of your library.

Kraul Harpooner.name: Kraul Harpooner
Kraul Harpooner.text:
Reach
Undergrowth — When Kraul Harpooner enters the battlefield, choose up to one target creature with flying you don't control. Kraul Harpooner gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard, then you may have Kraul Harpooner fight that creature.

Vraska, Golgari Queen.name: Vraska, Golgari Queen
Vraska, Golgari Queen.text:
+2: You may sacrifice another permanent. If you do, you gain 1 life and draw a card.
-3: Destroy target nonland permanent with converted mana cost 3 or less.
-9: You get an emblem with "Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, that player loses the game."

Assassin's Trophy.flavor: A power vacuum for the Azorius. A keepsake for Vraska.
Assassin's Trophy.name: Assassin's Trophy
Assassin's Trophy.text: Destroy target permanent an opponent controls. Its controller may search their library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle their library.

Finality.name: Finality
Finality.text: You may put two +1/+1 counters on a creature you control. Then all creatures get -4/-4 until end of turn.

Status.name: Status
Status.text: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains deathtouch until end of turn.

Golgari Guildgate.flavor:
"Shut the gates. In the Underrealm we will outlast the coming doom."
—Vraska
Golgari Guildgate.name: Golgari Guildgate
Golgari Guildgate.text:
Golgari Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B} or {G}.

Circuitous Route.flavor:
"The shortest path between two points is not always the safest."
—Tamina, district guide
Circuitous Route.name: Circuitous Route
Circuitous Route.text: Search your library for up to two basic land cards and/or Gate cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

Sprouting Renewal.name: Sprouting Renewal
Sprouting Renewal.text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Choose one —
• Create a 2/2 green and white Elf Knight creature token with vigilance.
• Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

Prey Upon.flavor:
"Light up the dark to find your way, and the dark may seek you out."
—Zalin the Gutter Bard
Prey Upon.name: Prey Upon
Prey Upon.text: Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

Sworn Companions.flavor:
"The trouble with youths these days is that, in outright defiance of their elders, they refuse to be bought."
—Karlov of the Ghost Council
Sworn Companions.name: Sworn Companions
Sworn Companions.text: Create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens with lifelink.

Pause for Reflection.name: Pause for Reflection
Pause for Reflection.text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

Conclave Tribunal.name: Conclave Tribunal
Conclave Tribunal.text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
When Conclave Tribunal enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Conclave Tribunal leaves the battlefield.

Join Shields.flavor: "We are the shield that never breaks, the bough that never burns, the song that can never be silenced."
Join Shields.name: Join Shields
Join Shields.text: Untap all creatures you control. They gain hexproof and indestructible until end of turn. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control. Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy them.)

Camaraderie.flavor:
"Within the song of Mat'Selesnya, one becomes all."
—Heruj, Selesnya hierophant
Camaraderie.name: Camaraderie
Camaraderie.text: You gain X life and draw X cards, where X is the number of creatures you control. Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

Trostani Discordant.name: Trostani Discordant
Trostani Discordant.text:
Other creatures you control get +1/+1.
When Trostani Discordant enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens with lifelink.
At the beginning of your end step, each player gains control of all creatures they own.

Rosemane Centaur.flavor: "I long for peaceful times, when I may tend to my garden instead of our borders."
Rosemane Centaur.name: Rosemane Centaur
Rosemane Centaur.text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Vigilance

Worldsoul Colossus.name: Worldsoul Colossus
Worldsoul Colossus.text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Worldsoul Colossus enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.

Loxodon Restorer.name: Loxodon Restorer
Loxodon Restorer.text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
When Loxodon Restorer enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.

Venerated Loxodon.name: Venerated Loxodon
Venerated Loxodon.text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of the creature's color.)
When Venerated Loxodon enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature that convoked it.

Knight of Autumn.name: Knight of Autumn
Knight of Autumn.text:
When Knight of Autumn enters the battlefield, choose one —
• Put two +1/+1 counters on Knight of Autumn.
• Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
• You gain 4 life.

Ledev Champion.name: Ledev Champion
Ledev Champion.text:
Whenever Ledev Champion attacks, you may tap any number of untapped creatures you control. Ledev Champion gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature tapped this way.
{3}{G}{W}: Create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token with lifelink.

Siege Wurm.flavor: Suddenly, all the haggling didn't seem so important.
Siege Wurm.name: Siege Wurm
Siege Wurm.text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

Arboretum Elemental.name: Arboretum Elemental
Arboretum Elemental.text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of the creature's color.)
Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

Flight of Equenauts.flavor: "Yes, there's competition between our equenauts and the Boros skyjeks. At least they think it's a competition."
Flight of Equenauts.name: Flight of Equenauts
Flight of Equenauts.text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Flying

Emmara, Soul of the Accord.flavor: "Whatever hatred destroys, a single act of trust can revive."
Emmara, Soul of the Accord.name: Emmara, Soul of the Accord
Emmara, Soul of the Accord.text: Whenever Emmara, Soul of the Accord becomes tapped, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token with lifelink.

Conclave Guildmage.name: Conclave Guildmage
Conclave Guildmage.text:
{G}, {T}: Creatures you control gain trample until end of turn.
{5}{W}, {T}: Create a 2/2 green and white Elf Knight creature token with vigilance.

Conclave Cavalier.flavor: "Just as leaves fall and the tree blooms again, one day I will fall and the Conclave will endure."
Conclave Cavalier.name: Conclave Cavalier
Conclave Cavalier.text:
Vigilance
When Conclave Cavalier dies, create two 2/2 green and white Elf Knight creature tokens with vigilance.

Flower.name: Flower
Flower.text: Search your library for a basic Forest or Plains card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

Assure.name: Assure
Assure.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. That creature gains indestructible until end of turn.

Temple Garden.flavor:
"Where the roots reach, there the temple rises."
—Niszka, Selesnya evangel
Temple Garden.name: Temple Garden
Temple Garden.text:
({T}: Add {G} or {W}.)
As Temple Garden enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.

Selesnya Guildgate.flavor:
"Everyone who crosses that threshold is our most cherished friend. Everyone who crosses it again is our bitterest enemy."
—Trostani
Selesnya Guildgate.name: Selesnya Guildgate
Selesnya Guildgate.text:
Selesnya Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G} or {W}.

Shalai, Voice of Plenty.name: Shalai, Voice of Plenty
Shalai, Voice of Plenty.text:
Flying
You, planeswalkers you control, and other creatures you control have hexproof.
{4}{G}{G}: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.
